content.introduction:
inotify_init1()
 should include 
IN_CLOEXEC
 in its type argument
to avoid the file descriptor leakage. Without this flag, an opened
sensitive file would remain open across a fork+exec to a
lower-privileged SELinux domain.

Examples:

inotify_init1
(
IN_NONBLOCK
);



// becomes



inotify_init1
(
IN_NONBLOCK
 
|
 
IN_CLOEXEC
);
